snippet: Well before Medtronic Inc and Covidien Plc announced their $43 billion merger, the two medical device makers had reached common conclusions about how they needed to change....

headline.print_headline: Medtronic, Covidien Match Up on Services Strategy Before Deal
headline.main: Medtronic, Covidien Match Up on Services Strategy Before Deal

lead_paragraph: Well before Medtronic Inc and Covidien Plc announced their $43 billion merger, the two medical device makers had reached common conclusions about how they needed to change.
